data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI kale wolai gila teʋeni, é ʋa, é Zonase ɓɔle. Zonase kɛɛni kalei ɠoozu ga folo saʋagɔ, kpidi saʋagɔ.
Zonase yɛni kalei ɠoozu, é Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maanɛɛnɛ, ná-GALAGI.
È pìlini ya kpoloɗɛi ma ʋalii zu,
Gè ɠɛni ɓɔɠɔ ma: ‹Wɛlɛ bà, màaɠoozaai na è ʋa,
Ziɛi lɛɛni mà, é zeeli kɔ̀daʋɛ,
Gè yeini kpoloɗɛi ɓomaʋɛ, ʋɛ gizeiti kpein tɔɔzeiɗai ná,
Siɛgi zu kì ge la mɔ ɠɛni bà la ga zɛ̀nvui ɠa yɛ sù,
Niiti ti ɓɔɠɔ veezu kɔɔɠɔ ganigiti zea, naati ta ɠɛlɛzu è-zaalai ʋa.
Kɛlɛ nɔ̀un, nà nà-faanɛɛ wuuɠwɛɛgai loo è ʋɛ ga guyei,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛni kalei ʋɔ, é unpili ga Zonase kakei ma.
